name: Color Maze!
description:
Grab this super exciting new puzzle game for FREE!

Swipe up, down and all around to send your glowing ball rolling through the maze and paint your way across the maze puzzles. Complete the levels of each puzzle by covering every corridor and corner with beautifully bright color. It feels so satisfying, just try to play the game to see that it is true!

Color maze! is an exciting free casual game you will want to tell your friends about. Which level can they get to?!

【Features】
- Interesting and fun puzzles
- Bright and colourful 3d graphics
- Fun and relaxing to play
- Easy game controls
- Offline gameplay: enjoy the game even without WiFi.

【How to play】
- Swipe to move the ball and paint - fill each square to unlock more addictive maze paint puzzles.
- Level after level, the difficulty increases and the maze gets more complicated!

Color maze! never ceases to amaze!
